title: Louis Gigante, Priest Who Led South Bronx Revival, Dies at 90
description: The brother of a convicted Mafia boss, he became a Democratic Party leader and a city councilman, and helped build thousands of units of housing.
dc:creator: Robert D. McFadden
media:credit: Don Hogan Charles/The New York Times
media:description: The Rev. Louis R. Gigante on a lot in the Bronx. He was instrumental in turning a notorious slum in the South Bronx into a thriving neighborhood.
